eu.amidst.flinklink.core.conceptdrift

Class IDAConceptDriftDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.flinklink.core.conceptdrift.IDAConceptDriftDetector

  • public class IDAConceptDriftDetector
extends Object
    This class contains the functionality for using the concept drift apporoach based on probabilitic graphical models detailed in the following paper, Borchani et al. Modeling concept drift: A probabilistic graphical model based approach. IDA 2015.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#nbconceptdriftexample

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IDAConceptDriftDetector.DriftDetector
      Represents the drift detection mode.
